name: Itau Unibanco Banco Holding SA

name: Itau Unibanco Banco Holding SA
title: Itaú raises $400 mln from IFC  other banks for renewable energy

content: SAO PAULO  Jan 5 Companies announced $77.07 billion worth of corporate takeovers in Brazil last year  the largest amount since 2011  a Thomson Reuters report on M&A activity showed on Monday. Some 553 deals were announced last year  down from 633 in 2013  according to the report.     M&A activity should gain steam in coming months as a slumping currency and lower asset prices prompted foreign companies and investment funds to spend $33.1 billion on takeovers in Latin America's larges
name: Itau Unibanco Banco Holding SA
title: TABLE-Credit Suisse  Itaú BBA top Brazil M&A rankings in 2014
